评论用户: I can’t return this because of the policy. This item it too big for my dog and she will never grow into it . I don’t advise anyone ordering from this company
评论详情: Really like it, but wish the pearl was a bit smaller

评论概述: Pretty but not at all purple...
评论详情: Hey Everyone, Dori here. I absolutely love pearls. But I was really expecting this one to be purple like in the ad. It's rather on the brownish pinkish side. That's why I gave 4 stars. It is still a beautiful necklace and can be worn with anything. Fits nice made well. Worth it, recommended.
I like this pearl necklace, the quality is nice, the pearl is big, the color is nice, very simple, durable, great value

评论概述: Lovely pearl, does not feel genuine
评论详情: Pendant arrives in a very nice gift box with seller name embossed on lid. The chain holding the pearl is a box style with a small claw-style clasp, a bit slippery to maneuver so I used the edge of a fingernail to grasp it. There was a very strong chemical odor when I first opened the box. It has dissipated now but was very noticeable. The pearl itself is large with a lovely luster. Color is a combination of pink, lavender and grey. I ran the pearl across the biting edge of my teeth and it feels smooth, not gritty. Not entirely certain this is a genuine pearl, cultured or not.

This necklace is beautiful. The pearl is large and smooth, kind of a rose gold color. I was hoping for more of a pink or purple, but I understand natural variations happen. The chain is delicate but sturdy, and it's a good length. For less than $100, I'm very pleased.

Oh my, I cannot say enough good things about this necklace, or any of the other pearl jewelry I have bought from this seller! Their  pearls  are large, lustrous and of high quality. Their prices are unbelievably low for what you get, allowing you to really buy a lot! The Edison Pearl is large, lustrous, and has hints of color that are just too beautiful to describe! Thanks to Amazon, you get their jewelry fast. Presentation boxes are just lovely. This is truly one of my favorite stores.
This pearl seems to be real. color of the pearl is lovely. I'm glad i got this necklace. I highly recommend.

This necklace definitely looks more expensive than it is. I love the color of the pearl, kind of a rosy chocolate color. I'll save this to wear for special occasions when I get dressed up, It would make a great gift for family or friend.

Not as purple as what's shown on its Amazon product photos. Mine's more of of a grayish lavender. And the V-style of the cubic zirconia holder of the pearl pendant looks more like parallel lines than a V. Still pretty though. Like the round cultured pearl. It's size makes it more visible. Also like the sterling silver base of this whole necklace and my strong magnet test seems to confirm that. It's not a fancy pearl necklace so won't look out of place when worn with shirt and jeans or leggings.  Recommended.

When I purchased this I thought I was getting a purple pearl as that is my favorite color and the color that is presented in the photos. So really bummed about this. Just be aware that the color in the photo may not be what you are getting.

This pendant is GORGEOUS! The pearl is perfectly smooth and almost perfectly round. The color is consistent across the pearl and shines beautifully in the sun! The setting is absolutely beautiful and it even comes with a descent quality box chain to match the beauty of the pearl! Looks very high quality and expensive! Very impressed!

This is a shiny and stunning pearl necklace.  The round purple pearl is smooth.  It has petite cubic zirconias above it.  The sparkling stones are firmly set.  The fine chain is durable.  This is a gorgeous pearl necklace.

Pearls are my birthstone, and I have a decent collection in my jewellery cabinet: everything from naturally coloured freshwaters and a classic akoya choker to dyed Honora sets and exquisite Aurora Hanadamas.  This is, however, my first Edison.The "purple" is definitely more of a lavender, but it is beautiful, and the colour changes slightly depending both on the light and the fabric against which the pearl is resting.  There are one or two minute-but-visible blemishes, but the surface is largely clean and the pearl is almost perfectly round and the size advertised.  It's not as metallic as some Edison pearls, but exhibits remarkable lustre and a gemmy shine.  It is set in sterling that is marked as S925, with a lovely single cz stone above the pearl.  The pendant comes on surprisingly strong and sturdy sterling box chain and is packaged in an elegant box.I am impressed enough with this pendant to be excited at the thought of ordering more from this company, and I very much recommend them to anyone who appreciates quality pearls.

I like the overall simplicity of the necklace. The sterling silver box chain is very delicate; three distinct "diamonds" descending in size lead to the main event of the piece - the large solitary round pearl which needs no further adornment.  I chose the larger pearl and I'm glad I did, but the "diamonds" make the necklace more suitable for dressy clothes. It's really pretty and needs to be featured against skin or fine textured fabric.  The pearl is beautiful in size, shape and luster. The color changes a bit depending on the light and background. The one I received is very pale purple - definitely not eggplant. Purple clothing brought out the purple in the pearl.  The clasp and chain are so delicate I had a little challenge connecting them even holding the piece in front of me to put it away. I'll probably need help putting it on because the closure and chain links are so tiny. There is no larger jump ring to catch.  Included in the gift box was a soft polishing cloth to keep the silver chain bright. So nice.  It's a beautiful necklace and I'll feel special when I wear it.
